tutorial.text: Good day! My name is Sam and I can see it's your first time you're trying to open a gastronomy business. Beginning anything can be hard. I'm here to make your work easier. But you are the one making decisions. Is this your first time playing this game?

responses.text: Oh excellent. In that case let's dive right in and pick a location to open your business!

No worries. That's what I'm here for. I will be your personal assistant and present to you everything you need to decide on and all you gotta do is to tell me whether you agree or not. I will take care of the rest.

beginner.text: Nice to meet you! I'm Jankins and I can be of great help if you want to get into the gastro business. My specialty is making your own staff happy! Would you like to work with me?

responses.text: Well that's a bummer. I doubt anyone else will be able to help you keep your staff happy.
You and your employees won't regret it!

beginner.text: Hey! I hear you want to get into the gastro business. Great! I can help you with that. I'm Fred. I know my way around restaurants and can be of lots of help. Should I be your personal assistant?

responses.text: You're nothing without me!
Great! You won't regret this! I will help you build the best business possible!

beginner.text: Hey! I'm Bob. I'm a financial advisor. I hear you want to build a new restaurant. Do you want me to be your advisor?

responses.text: Very bad decision.
Excellent decision. Together we will build a financially very successful business.

beginner.text: Good afternoon. My name is James and I know my way around making people happy. What do you think? Should we go into business together?

responses.text: Hm. Did not expect that. Well then have a good live.
Wise choice. We will be a great team!

intermediate.text: Greetings. Let's start a business together. No fuzz no muzz. Are you in?

responses.text: Good bye.
Good.

expert.text: Good to see you again! It's me, Sam! Do you remember me?

responses.text: Too bad. I really thought we're a good team
The gang is back together!

expert.text: Hello there! I'm Willy the astronaut and I hear you are planning to open a restaurant. You know where you could be a real entrepreneur? On the moon! Should we start a restaurant together on the moon?

responses.text: No adventurer, huh? No problem. I'll leave then.
Woohoo! This will be an adventure!

expert.text: Good day. I'm Fred and as a former psychologist I know what people are like. Would you like to start a business with me?

responses.text: Well. Darn.
Fantastic. People will love our restaurant.

expert.text: What up?! Let's start a gastronomy business together and make it the most awesome place to work. My name is Karl. Are you in?

responses.text: Employees don't seem to be important to you. I see.
Yes! Happy employees make a business much more successful.

expert.text: Hi, I'm Richard. But my friends call me Rich. And I can help you get rich, too! How? If you let me help you build your business, you will be rich in no time. Does that sound good?

responses.text: You don't like money, huh?
You won't regret this.

expert.text: Be well, my friend. I'm guru Urug. After having started a few business before, you know, how important it is to look after yourself first. I am here to help you run a business while staying sane and healthy. Do you want to work together?
